attributes.action: STOP giving immigrants jobs when UK citizens can't get one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Basically setting up a petition because I'm an 18yr old female who's been for about 20 job interviews and can't get a job due to immigrants coming over from poland and taking all the jobs.

Thanks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
